title: Edward Timpson – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Edward Timpson, the Conservative MP for Eddisbury, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
I am genuinely sorry for the instability and concern caused by the question of the Conservative Party leadership in recent months.
